edu.rosehulman.soar.datamap
Class DataMap

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.rosehulman.soar.datamap.DataMap
public class DataMap
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a DataMap file. Handles such functions as loading and saving the DataMap. To edit the DataMap, getRoot and perform the necessary modifications on that DMItem and its children.

Author:
Tim Jasko
See Also:
DMItem

Constructor Detail

DataMap

public DataMap(IFile file)
        throws java.lang.Exception
Constructs the DataMap from the file.

Parameters:
file - The file to load the DataMap from.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Any exception encountered while attempting to load the file.

DataMap

public DataMap(IFile file,
               boolean load)
        throws java.lang.Exception
Constructs a new Datamap, allowing you not to load from the file. This is useful in such cases where a new datamap file has just been created and you still need to initialize the contents.

Parameters:
file - The file to load the DataMap from.
load - true to load from the file, false not to.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Any exception encountered while attempting to load the file.

             throws java.lang.Exception
